i.name: Chosen of the Storm
i.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

q.name: Rolling Thunder
q.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.

w.name: Frenzy
w.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.

e.name: Majestic Roar
e.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages, slows, and slightly knocks back enemies. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt additional damage. Minions and monsters are feared as well.

r.name: Thunder Claws
r.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number of nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.

riot.name: Chosen of the Storm
riot.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

i1.name: Chosen of the Storm
i1.blurb: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} When '''Volibear's''' health drops {{as|{{sti|health|below 30% of his '''maximum''' health}}}} he [[health regeneration|regenerates]] {{as|{{sti|health|30% of his '''maximum''' health}}}} over 6 seconds.
notes: * ''Chosen of the Storm's'' cooldown starts as soon as it activates.
* If the cooldown ends while '''Volibear''' is under 30% health ''Chosen of the Storm'' will not trigger unless he takes damage.
* If '''Volibear''' is killed directly from anywhere higher than 30% health ''Chosen of the Storm'' will not activate and therefore will not go on cooldown.

riot.name: Rolling Thunder
riot.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
riot.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

q1.name: Rolling Thunder
q1.blurb: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next 4 seconds, increased when moving towards a nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy [[champion]] within {{tt|1800|Estimated}} units of him.
q1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|15 to 25}}%|Increased Movement Speed|{{ap|30 to 60}}%}}
q1.description2: For the duration, '''Volibear's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|airborne|flings}} his target over and behind himself.
notes: * Enemy can be flinged through very thin walls.
* ''Volibear'' will retain the bonus movement speed for ''Rolling Thunder's'' full duration even if he flings his target before it expires.
* When '''Volibear''' changes direction (from "towards champions" to any other direction), his bonus movement speed decays over 1 second.

riot.name: Frenzy
riot.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e7 }}% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a minion or monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%.

w1.name: Frenzy
w1.blurb: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Volibear's''' basic attacks grant {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, '''Volibear''' gains the ability to cast ''Frenzy''.
w1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed Per Stack|{{ap|4 to 20}}%|Total Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|4*3 to 20*3}}%}}
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' bites the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, increasing by {{as|{{pp|11|type=target's '''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
w1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 260}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' health)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 260*2}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
w1.description3: ''Frenzy's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is halved if it is used on a {{tip|minion}} or {{tip|monster}}.

riot.name: Majestic Roar
riot.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages, slows, and slightly knocks back enemies. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt additional damage. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
riot.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ damage }} magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back slightly and slowing them by {{ movespeedmod*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Enemies who are airborne or dashing take an additional {{ bonusdamageratio*100 }}% Max Health magic damage.

Additionally, minions and monsters are feared for 3 seconds.

e1.name: Majestic Roar
e1.blurb: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies, slightly {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for 3 seconds. [[Minion]]s and [[monster]]s are instead {{tip|fear|feared}} and slowed by 100% for the same duration.
e1.description2: Enemies who are dashing or are {{tip|airborne}} during ''Majestic Roar'' are dealt an additional {{as|8% of their '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|magic damage}}.
notes: * {{tip|airborne|Airbone}} can also be enemies affected by ally abilities or {{ai|Rolling Thunder|Volibear}}.
* ''Majestic Roar'' will fear clones ({{ai|Children of the Grave|Mordekaiser}}, {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}).

riot.name: Thunder Claws
riot.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number of nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

r1.name: Thunder Claws
r1.blurb: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.1}} seconds, '''Volibear''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to up to 8 nearby enemies.
r1.description2: Afterwards, for 12 seconds, '''Volibear's''' basic attacks deal the same damage as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} that bounces instantly to up to 7 nearby unaffected enemies.
notes: * On cast ''Volibear'' gets slightly larger in size.
